name: get_player_info
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool valorant_esports_v2.
Tool description: The Valorant Esports is a user-friendly tool that allows you to extract data from the website vlr.gg. 
API description: Fetches and returns information about a Valorant esports player using the RapidAPI service.

playerid.description: The unique identifier of the player.
